00016 #define __TIMER_H__
00017 
00018 #if defined(WIN32) || defined(WIN64)
00019 
00020 #include <windows.h>
00021 typedef __int64 timer_clock_t;
00022 typedef __int64 timer_delta_t;
00023 
00024 #else   // Linux & Mac
00025 
00026 #include <sys/time.h>
00027 typedef struct timeval timer_clock_t;
00028 typedef long timer_delta_t;
00029 
00030 #endif
00031 
00036 static timer_delta_t s_timer_freq = 1000;
00037 
00038 void timer_init(void)
00039 {
00040 #ifdef WIN32
00041     QueryPerformanceFrequency((LARGE_INTEGER*)&s_timer_freq);
00042 #else
00043     s_timer_freq = 1000;    // milliseconds
00044 #endif
00045 }
00046 
00050 static void timer_start(timer_clock_t *start)
00051 {
00052 #ifdef WIN32
00053     QueryPerformanceCounter((LARGE_INTEGER*)start);
00054 #else
00055     gettimeofday(start, 0);
00056 #endif
00057 }
00058 
00062 static timer_delta_t timer_delta(timer_clock_t *start)
00063 {
00064     timer_clock_t finish;
00065 #ifdef WIN32
00066     QueryPerformanceCounter((LARGE_INTEGER*)&finish);
00067     return (finish - *start);
00068 #else
00069     gettimeofday(&finish, 0);
00070     return (finish.tv_sec - start->tv_sec) * 1000
00071         + (finish.tv_usec - start->tv_usec) / 1000;
00072 #endif
00073 }
00074 
00078 static int timer_delta_sec(timer_delta_t delta)
00079 {
00080     if (delta == 0) delta = 1;
00081     if (s_timer_freq > 0)
00082         return (int)(delta / s_timer_freq);
00083     else
00084         return 0;
00085 }
00086 
00090 static double timer_delta_sec_dbl(timer_delta_t delta)
00091 {
00092     if (s_timer_freq > 0)
00093         return (double)delta / (double)s_timer_freq;
00094     else
00095         return 0;
00096 }
00097 
00101 static int timer_delta_ms(timer_delta_t delta)
00102 {
00103     if (s_timer_freq > 1000)
00104         return (int)(delta / (s_timer_freq/1000));
00105     else
00106         return (int)(delta*1000 / s_timer_freq);
00107 }
00108 
00112 static int timer_delta_mks(timer_delta_t delta)
00113 {
00114     if (s_timer_freq > 1000000)
00115         return (int)(delta / (s_timer_freq/1000000));
00116     else
00117         return (int)(delta*1000000 / s_timer_freq);
00118 }
